scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a young Christ Child, adorned with a halo and holding a golden orb topped with a cross, standing and gesturing with his right hand. He is dressed in a blue robe. Behind and below him, a bearded man, also with a halo, looks upwards with his mouth open. He is dressed in a blue garment and a pink mantle, and holds a wooden staff. The figures are framed by a golden archway, suggesting an architectural setting. The background is a blue sky with distant, stylized mountains.
